parameter.name: ManualTCName
parameter.value: DDTC-30783 TC_05_To verify If WNBEN is OFF Bene card should not show

parameter.name: ManualTCName
parameter.value: DDTC-28387 QA07_PW-21965_Verify New Beneficiaries Card Account overview page if participant has beneficiary turned off at the plan level

parameter.name: ManualTCName
parameter.value: DDTC-30779 TC_01_To verify If WNBEN is ON WUBENE is OFF and there is at least one beneficiary card the link should say View details

parameter.name: ManualTCName
parameter.value: DDTC-30781 TC_03_verify If WNBEN and WUBENE is ON and no bene on card AOD page should display beneficiaries card with the text None on file and with the link Add now

parameter.name: ManualTCName
parameter.value: DDTC-30782 TC_04_To verify If WNBEN is ON WUBENE is ON and greater than 1 bene on card AOD page should display beneficiaries card with the AddEdit link
